# Result Storage


<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

## ResultStorage Class

Handles saving and loading transcription results to/from JSON files.
Organizes results by date with metadata for easy retrieval.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

href="https://github.com/cj-mills/cjm-fasthtml-workflow-transcription-single-file/blob/main/cjm_fasthtml_workflow_transcription_single_file/storage/file_storage.py#L18"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

``` python

def ResultStorage(
    config:StorageConfig, # Storage configuration
):

```

*File-based storage for transcription results.*

### ResultStorage.save

``` python

def save(
    job_id:str, # Unique job identifier
    file_path:str, # Path to the transcribed media file
    file_name:str, # Name of the media file
    plugin_id:str, # Plugin unique identifier
    plugin_name:str, # Plugin display name
    text:str, # The transcription text
    metadata:Optional=None, # Optional metadata from the transcription plugin
    additional_info:Optional=None, # Optional additional information to store
)->Path: # Path to the saved JSON file

```

*Save a transcription result to JSON file.*

### ResultStorage.load

``` python

def load(
    result_file:Path, # Path to the JSON result file
)->Optional: # Dictionary containing the result data, or None if error

```

*Load a transcription result from JSON file.*

### ResultStorage.list_results

``` python

def list_results(
    sort_by:str='timestamp', # Field to sort by ("timestamp", "file_name", "word_count")
    reverse:bool=True, # Sort in reverse order (newest first by default)
)->List: # List of result dictionaries

```

*List all saved transcription results.*
